SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
SALESFORCE.ORG GENERAL PRODUCT DOCUMENTATION
Planning Resources for Salesforce

Learn about all the resources that you can access to help you plan a successful implementation of Salesforce for Nonprofits or Salesforce for Education.

Get Started with Salesforce Fundamentals for Nonprofits
Discover all the available resources to help you implement Salesforce for your nonprofit institution.
Get Started with Salesforce Fundamentals for Education
Discover all the available resources to help you implement Salesforce for your educational institution.
Nonprofit Metrics for Success
Sample key performance indicators for nonprofit organizations.
Sample Discovery Questions for Nonprofit Organizations
Before implementing Salesforce, many nonprofits will go through a “discovery” process in order to clarify where their pain points are and establish big picture objectives. This information helps prioritize their needs and create phases for implementing Salesforce. Here are some sample discovery questions that can help nonprofits be explicit about what improvements they are trying to make. By getting clear on what you’re trying to accomplish, not only can you set realistic, phased goals for implementation, but you can also more easily set measures for success and track your progress towards these goals.
Establishing Good Governance
Following the principles of good governance provides a clear and consistent framework to manage change over time and defines processes to resolve conflicting requirements.
Demystifying Digital Transformation
Digital Transformation is a buzzword that gets thrown around a lot in the tech industry. The advantage of using terms like this is that it gives everyone a common way to refer to something. The disadvantage is that the same term can have many different meanings depending on the context it gets used in and who the audience is. Things can start to become even more confusing over time as industry trends change.
Avoid Installing NPSP and EDA in the Same Org
Education Data Architecture (EDA) and Nonprofit Success Pack (NPSP) won't work together in Salesforce.
Salesforce.org Product Localization
This article provides information about Salesforce.org localization and lists the supported languages for each product.
